details:
noun
- an act exempting someone
= example: an act exempting someone
= synonyms: exemption
- the quality of being unaffected by something
= example: the quality of being unaffected by something
- the state of not being susceptible
= synonyms: unsusceptibility
- the condition in which an organism can resist disease
= example: the condition in which an organism can resist disease
= synonyms: resistance
